title: Countercurse Mantra
summaries: The Countercurse Mantra is an accessory that combines the functions of the Megaphone and the Nazar. This item grants immunity to both the Silenced and Cursed debuffs.
It is one of the ingredients required to make the Ankh Charm, which is further required to make the Ankh Shield.

While the Countercurse Mantra is exclusive to Hardmode on the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it can be obtained in pre-Hardmode on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, as you can obtain the Megaphone by throwing the Nazar into Shimmer.
